Title: Family Affair
Plot: A rising young star is killed in a wreck and her determined stalker claims credit, but the team finds out there's more to this tragedy than meets the eye.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Writer: Naren Shankar, Bradley Thompson, David Weddle
GuestStars: Garret Dillahunt, Brian Tee, Morgan Rusler, Tahyna Tozzi, David Sullivan, Marc Vann, Jon Wellner, Larry Sullivan, Michael Bryan French
